verses.1: Tua ciangin Topa in ama galte khempeuhʼ khut sung le Saulʼ khut sung panin amah a hotkhiat hunin David in hih la kammalte Topaʼ tungah a gen hi.
verses.2: Amah in, “ Topa, kei hong hupa, ka kulhpi, kei hong hon khia pa,
verses.3: ka Pasian, ka kihutna, ka bukna pa, lum bangin kei a hong dal, ka mun muanhuai le ka belh, keimah hong hon khia pa hi a, ngong hihna panin hong hon hi.
verses.4: A phat taak Topa ka sam a, ka galte kiang panin kei hong kihon hi.
verses.5: “Bang hang hiam cih leh sihna tuihualte in kei hong tum a, siatna tuikhangte in kei hong nawk hi.
verses.6: Leinuai khaute in kei hong kancip a, sihna thangte in kei hong dawntuah hi.
verses.7: Ka lungkhamna ah Topa ka sam a, ka Pasian ka sam hi. A biakinn panin amah in ka aw hong za a, ka kikona awging ama bil a tung hi.
verses.8: “Tua ciangin ama hehna hangin leitung kisingin, nakpi takin kilok gawp a, vantung bulpite kiliing gawp hi.
verses.9: A nakvang sung panin meikhu pusuak a, a kam sung panin a kaang tum mei pusuak a, ama tung panin mei-am san kuang khia hi.
verses.10: Amah in vantungte niamsakin hong pai suk a, ama khe nuai ah khuamial sahpi om hi.
verses.11: Kherub khat tungah amah tuangin hong leng a, huih khate tungah amah kimu hi.
verses.12: Amah in ama kimkot ah khuamial bawl a, a tung kikhuh nadingin meii sahpi a zang hi.
verses.13: Ama mai-a a taang sung panin mei-amte kuang khia hi.
verses.14: “Vantung panin Topa hong awng suk a, Sangpen pa in a aw hong gingsak hi.
verses.15: Amah in thaltangte lawnin thehthang gawp a, khuaphialep phiasakin amaute a taisak hi.
verses.16: Tua ciangin Topaʼ mawhsakna awging lianpi hangin tuipi tawte kidawk a, lei bulpite a guakin om hi.
verses.17: “Amah in a sangna mun panin hong banin kei hong la a, tui thukpi panin kei hong kai khia hi.
verses.18: A hat ka galte panin kei hong hon khia a, kei hong mudahte panin hong suaktasak hi. Keima adingin ka galte hat lua uh hi.
verses.19: Ka kamsiat ni-in kei hong sim gawp uh a, ahih hangin Topa in kei hong huh hi.
verses.20: Amah in mun tanzau khat ah kei hong paikhiatpih a, kei tungah lungkim ahih manin kei hong hon khia hi.
verses.21: “Ka thumanna tawh kizui-in Topa in thaman hong pia a, ka sianthona tawh kizui-in hong dinkik hi.
verses.22: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topaʼ thu ka zui a, ka Pasian ka langpang kei hi.
verses.23: Ama biakna ngeina kipte hoihtakin ka zui a, ama thukhamte panin kei ka pial kei hi.
verses.24: Ama mai ah kawk ka baang kei a, kisuanna dangte panin hoihtakin ka kikem hi.
verses.25: Tua ahih ciangin Topa in ka thumanna, ama muhna ah ka sianthona tawh kizui-in kei hong dinkik khin hi.
verses.26: “Thuman mi tungah nangmah na thuman a, a kawkbaang lo mi tungah a kawkbaang loin na gamta hi.
verses.27: A siangtho mi tungah a siangtho-in na gamta a, a thukawi mi tungah thupeelin na gamta hi.
verses.28: Nangmah in miniamte na hon khia a, ahih hangin a kiphasakte na niamkhiat hi.
verses.29: Topa aw, nang pen keima meivak na hi hi. Ka Pasian in ka khuamial vaksak hi.
verses.30: Nangma hangin galkap hon khat ka su gawp zo a, ka Pasianʼ hangin khuakulh khat ka kan zo hi.
verses.31: “Hih Pasian a thu kicing a, Topaʼ kamciamna a manna kilang hi. Amah a beelte khempeuh adingin kidalna lum ahi hi.
verses.32: Topa longal Pasian kua hiam? I Pasian sim loh, hong hu kua hiam?
verses.33: Hih Pasian, a muanhuai keima belh hi a, ka lampi khempeuh lungmuanhuaisak hi.
verses.34: Amah in sakhipiteʼ khe bangin ka khe kipsak a, mun sangna ah keimah hong koih hi.
verses.35: Amah in galsim zia kei hong hilh a, sumngo thal khauh pente ka keek zo hi.
verses.36: “Nangmah in kei hong dalin na hong hon khia a, nangma hong huhna in kei hong liansak hi.
verses.37: Ka kalsuan nading mun tanzau keima nuai ah nong pia a, ka khe taal lo hi.
verses.38: Ka galte delhin ka susia a, amaute a beitum mateng kei ka kileh kei hi.
verses.39: Amaute ka beisak a, amaute ka sun let hi; amaute thokik nawn lo uh a, ka khe nuai ah amaute puk uh hi.
verses.40: “Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in galdo nadingin tha nong guan a, keimah hong dote ka nuai ah na nengniam hi.
verses.41: Nangmah in ka galte, kei hong mudahte, na nungkiksak a, keimah in amaute ka susia gawp hi.
verses.42: Amaute khuadak uh a, ahih hangin a hon khia ding kuamah om lo hi. Topaʼ tungah hong ko uh a, ahih hangin amah in amaute dawng lo hi.
verses.43: “Leivui bangin amaute ka satvui a, kongzing buante bangin amaute tuan khamin ka sikcip suk hi.
verses.44: Mite tawh kidona panin nangmah in nong hon khia a, minamteʼ lutangin kei nong bawl a, ka theih ngei loh mite in keima na hong sem uh hi.
verses.45: Keimah mai-etin gamdang mite ka kiangah hong pai uh hi. Amaute in ka thu a zak phetun, ka thu hong mang uh hi.
verses.46: Gamdang mite lungkia uh a, a phualkip panun liingin hong paikhia uh hi.
verses.47: “ Topa hing hi; kei hong hupa in thupha ngah henla, ka Pasian, kei hong hon khia pa,
verses.48: hong thuksakin, keima nuai ah mite a koih suk Pasian,
verses.49: ka galte kiang panin kei hong paikhiatpih pa vanglian tahen. Nangmah in ka langte tungah kei nong liansak a, mi ngongtatte kiang panin kei nong hon khia hi.
verses.50: “ Topa aw, hih thu hangin minam khempeuh lakah nang kong phat dinga, na minphatna la ka sa ding hi.
verses.51: Zawhna lianpi ama kumpipa tungah pia a, a sathau nilh pa David le a suanlekhakte tungah a tawntungin itna kip a lak hi,” a ci hi.
